Well, when you threaten my pawn like that, I'm going to take yours.
And this is what changed the tone of the game entirely.

Another mistake by Black allows me to take a pawn and make this move. A better move might have been Bd6 to protect that space until he could move the other pieces (mostly the knight that blocks the rook) to prevent this move.
